Converts _Forge Energy_ into a configurable amount of _Rotational_ _Force_.
block.createmore.smart_motor.tooltip.sum: A more advanced version of the _Electric Motor_.
block.createmore.smart_motor.tooltip.con: When connected to a CC Computer
block.createmore.smart_motor.tooltip.beh: Can be remotely controlled through a connected computer.
createmore.gui.no_power.hint: This device is not receiving enough _Forge Energy_ to power itself. Try supplying it with more energy, or reduce it's speed.
createmore.gui.turned_off.hint: This device is currently turned off through _Redstone_.
